categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: House Keltal was a guild active in Depatar, a city of the gas giant Genarius. The permitor Sadana was affiliated to this house, apparently trying to direct costumers to business also affiliated to the house.

This organization is not named. However, the character Sadana is sometimes identified as Sadana of Keltal which seems to be one of the ways a permitor identifies the house he or she is associated with.
